segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: Hi, my name is John Doe. I'm calling because I noticed some unusual transactions on my account, and I need to verify what's going on.

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: Hi John, I’d be happy to assist you. For security purposes, can you please confirm your date of birth and billing address?

segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: Sure. My date of birth is March 15, 1985, and my billing address is 1234 Elm Street, Springfield, IL, 62704.

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: Thank you, John. Let me pull up your account details... Okay, I see the transactions you’re referring to. Can you confirm the last four digits of your account number?

segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: Yes, the last four digits of my account number are 4821.

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: Got it. I see two transactions from a retailer in Miami, Florida, totaling $375. Were these transactions made by you?

segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: No, I haven’t been to Florida in years. These are definitely fraudulent charges.

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: Understood. I will immediately flag these as unauthorized and initiate a dispute. Your card ending in 4821 will be deactivated. Would you like us to send a replacement card to your current address?

segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: Yes, please send it to my home address: 1234 Elm Street, Springfield, IL, 62704.

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: The replacement card will arrive in 5-7 business days. In the meantime, I recommend enabling transaction alerts via email or SMS. Would you like me to set that up for you?

segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: Yes, please enable SMS alerts for my number: (555) 123-4567.

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: Done. You will now receive a text notification for every transaction above $10. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

segments.speaker: CUSTOMER
segments.text: No, that covers everything. Thank you for your help!

segments.speaker: REPRESENTATIVE
segments.text: You're very welcome, John! Have a great day.
